Prepaid income taxes and income taxes payable
Prepaid Income Taxes And Accrued Income Taxes Payable

The net change during the reporting period in income taxes receivable, which represents the amount due from tax authorities for refunds of overpayments or recoveries of income taxes paid, combined with the net change during the period in the amount of cash payments due to taxing authorities for taxes that are based on the reporting entity's earnings.
